name: Drunk War
description:
Drunk War is a multiplayer game where you play as a drunk guy and just killing his enemies. You can get powerups, ride a car or just punch NPCs. The maximum number of players in one room is 20 people.

You can talk with your enemies with spatial audio. Spatial audio enables talking with enemies only when you are close to them.

If you want to ride a car, first you need to unlock him in the secret room.

You can change your weapon with a scroll wheel on the mouse.

GAME IS NOT FINISHED AND IT CONTAIN SOME BUGS
